text: Narahari Haldankar is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Goa Legislative Assembly from Valpoi in the 1999 and 1999 Goa Legislative Assembly election as a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. He was Deputy Speakers of the Goa Legislative Assembly from June 2002 to February 2005It's BJP-Cong head-on as independent withdrawsHaldankar elected deputy speaker of Goa Legislative AssemblyGoa speaker, his deputy resignGoa speaker, his deputy resign ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Goa Legislative Assembly Category:Deputy Speakers of the Goa Legislative Assembly Category:People from South Goa district Category:Goa MLAs 1994–1999 Category:Goa MLAs 2002–2007 Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Goa
title: Narahari Haldankar
